alert.note: Alert for Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 10:39PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kearney County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1038 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Minden, or 8 miles southeast of Kearney, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Minden around 1045 PM CDT. Norman around 1055 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
